description_html:
The work of artist Shantell Martin is a meditation of lines; a language of characters, creatures and messages
that invite her viewers to share a role in her creative process. Part autobiographical and part dreamlike whimsy,
Martin has created her own world that bridges fine art, commercial and the everyday experience — conversations,
objects and places. Known for drawing on anything she comes across from walls to shoes to herself, Martin has
amassed an impressive body of work and turned the art world upside down.
In an exciting new collaboration, Shantell Martin and the Momentum Design Studio worked together
translating her drawings, thoughts and musings into four textiles designed to enliven and excite corporate
interiors. The designs are unique yet unified by a connecting story; a series of conversations between the
elements, places and internal questions of her life and of our own.
